Interface XMLTemplate

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    XMLRead

    public interface XMLTemplate

    XML Template Class

    A class used to provide simple methods for downloading and extracting data from XML pages.
    Version:
    12.01, 03/23/2012
    Author:
    John J. Couture
    See Also:
    Gaddis, Starting out with Java, 4th ed.,
    Working with XML by Sun Corporation,
    Document Builder Factory,
    Document Builder,
    Document,
    Document NodeList,
    Java 1.5 Documentation by Sun Corporation
    Prgm.usage:
    XMLRead xml = new XMLRead();

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int intRecordPos 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int find(java.lang.String strKeyName, java.lang.String strKeyContents)
      This function will search for a value represented by strKey in a field indicated by strKeyField.
      java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strFieldName)
      This method extracts the contents of the field at the the CURRENT position as determined by intRecNum.
      java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strField, int intRec)
      This method sets the current record to intRec and then extracts the contents of that field at that record.
      int getRecordCount(java.lang.String strFieldName)
      This method returns the number of records in the XML file after a getElementsByTagName() search
      void loadPage(java.lang.String strURL)
      This function accepts a URL to an XML page and stores it in a Document object.
      java.lang.String setTable(java.lang.String strTable)
      This function looks for a table name in the XML document and returns the first child node.
      void status(java.lang.String strVar)
      This method is just used to display data during testing.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string about this object.

    • Field Detail

      • intRecordPos

        static final int intRecordPos
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • loadPage

        void loadPage(java.lang.String strURL)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        This function accepts a URL to an XML page and stores it in a Document object. The class variable intRecNum is also set to -1.
        Parameters:
        strURL - - URL to the XML page (can be local or over the Internet)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setTable

        java.lang.String setTable(java.lang.String strTable)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This function looks for a table name in the XML document and returns the first child node.
        Parameters:
        strTable - - the name of the root table
        Returns:
        string - returns the child node as a string
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • find

        int find(java.lang.String strKeyName,
       java.lang.String strKeyContents)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        This function will search for a value represented by strKey in a field indicated by strKeyField.
        Parameters:
        strKeyName - - the field name to search
        strKeyContents - - the value of the field name to be searched
        Returns:
        integer - the record number(position) or a minus one if it did not find the key
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getField

        java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strFieldName)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method extracts the contents of the field at the the CURRENT position as determined by intRecNum.
        Parameters:
        strFieldName - - the field name of the data you want to retrieve
        Returns:
        integer - the contents of the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getField

        java.lang.String getField(java.lang.String strField,
                        int intRec)
                          throws java.lang.Exception
        This method sets the current record to intRec and then extracts the contents of that field at that record.
        Parameters:
        strField - - the field name of the data you want to retrieve
        intRec - - the record number to use
        Returns:
        string - the contents of the field
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • getRecordCount

        int getRecordCount(java.lang.String strFieldName)
        This method returns the number of records in the XML file after a getElementsByTagName() search
        Parameters:
        strFieldName - - this can be any field that is in the record
        Returns:
        integer - the number of records in that table

      • status

        void status(java.lang.String strVar)
        This method is just used to display data during testing.
        Parameters:
        strVar - - any string (it is displayed in the jGrasp messages window)

      • toString

        java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string about this object.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
